text.p: These are the leading stories in the Maltese press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- European Parliament told to take new action on trafficking in illegal immigrants. A British Labour MP presented a draft resolution following the reported drowning of some 300 would-be illegal immigrants on Christmas Day when the boat taking them to a Sicilian beach sank in a collision in the Malta-Sicily channel.

- Opposition leader Eddie Fenech Adami accuses the government of dishonesty and political immorality. Fenech Adami said the Labour government did not keep its electoral promises when it presented the budget.
